title: 7 ways to support kids' immune systems as they return to school and wait for the Covid vaccine
content:
1. 7 ways to support kids' immune systems as they return to school and wait for the Covid vaccine  CNN

  3. COVID-19 survivor urges people to get vaccinated  ABC Action News
  4. As child hospitalizations rise, leaders must act now | TheHill  The Hill
  5. Fatigue and politics work against contact-tracing foot soldiers  Modern Healthcare
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 学校に戻り、コビット・ワクチンを待つ子供たちの免疫システムをサポートする7つの方法
